column1: Q1c:In general, how safe do u feel when travelling on ugandan roads?

column53: Old Masaka Road(Kyengera-Kabojja Secondary school turn off) (Kampala/Wakiso)

column1: Q1d:If you are unsafe or very unsafe while travelling on ugandan roads, Why is this?

column53: Old Masaka Road(Kyengera-Kabojja Secondary school turn off) (Kampala/Wakiso)

column2: Poor quality of tarmacking on roads
No pedestrian and Boda boda paths
Big trucks/many boda bodas on the roads
People are not sensitised about road usage
